title: The Undead Day Fourteen
description: The Undead. The Number One Bestselling UK zombie horror series.  The Undead Day Fourteen. The second week reaches a thrilling climax as the group face their hardest day yet.  A deadly infection spreads across Europe. The Undead Series: A terrifying account of one man desperately struggling to survive this harrowing event.
author: R.R. Haywood
